item.title: MMM
item.description: score:121 Chances: 3M (MMM) reached $105.32 at the closing of the latest trading day, reflecting a +0.5% change compared to its last close. 3M (MMM) gains from solid momentum in its Transportation and Electronics segment, buyouts and shareholder-friendly policies. The industrial giant’s management had some excellent news for investors this week.
